text:
Hi community
Hope you all are doing great!
I have a question regarding the default contact and deal properties managed by HubSpot. Some of the contact properties like "Became a Customer Date," "Became an Evangelist Date," "Became a Lead Date," and "Became a Subscriber Date," as well as deal properties like "Invoice Due Date," "Invoice Recipient," "Invoice Status," and "Recurring Revenue Amount" are missing in my new HubSpot account. These properties were present in my previous HubSpot account. Has HubSpot changed how these properties are managed, or do they now come with any add-ons? Is there another way to access them? Please let me know.
Thank you!

Hi everyone! I have a question about the *`Main Contact`* property coming from the API. For some reason, when I call the API using the `companyId` with `crm.companies.basicApi.getById`, I only receive the name of the main contact. However, I can’t use it with the *ownersApi* or *contactsApi* to retrieve the rest of the information. Does anyone know how to resolve this?

Hi all, have an issue with API and hoping someone has run into it before / ideas on how to sort. Sending get request and pushing 25 params for default HubSpot properties. Always getting only 13 params in response.

Here's a sample:

```Deal ID: 15802976749
Get request on URL <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals/15802976749>

Passing params {"properties": ["dealname", "amount", "associated_email", "associated_company_btw", "associated_company_domain_name", "associated_company_name", "associated_contact_title", "associated_contact_name", "associated_contact_address_1", "associated_contact_city", "associated_contact_zip", "lead_kwaliteit", "HubSpot_id_deal", "closedate", "hs_analytics_latest_source_data_1", "hs_analytics_source", "hs_analytics_source_data_2", "hs_object_source_detail_1", "hs_object_source_detail_2", "num_contacted_notes", "closed_won_reason", "pipeline", "dealstage", "HubSpot_owner_id", "closed_won_reason", "notes_last_contacted", "HubSpot_owner_assigneddate", "notes_last_updated", "num_contacted_notes", "num_notes", "closedate", "description", "hs_is_open_count", "hs_object_source_detail_1", "hs_object_source_detail_2", "hs_object_source_detail_3", "id", "hs_lastmodifieddate", "sync_odoo", "hs_deal_stage_probability", "HubSpot_owner_id", "closedate", "odoo_id"]}

Response: {'id': '15802976749', 'properties': {'amount': '380', 'closedate': None, 'createdate': '2024-07-26T11:59:16.578Z', 'dealname': 'Pellettieri Real Estate - New Deal VME De Heuven A2', 'dealstage': 'presentationscheduled', 'hs_lastmodifieddate': '2024-10-08T10:11:02.445Z', 'hs_object_id': '15802976749', 'pipeline': 'default'}, 'createdAt': '2024-07-26T11:59:16.578Z', 'updatedAt': '2024-10-08T10:11:02.445Z', 'archived': False}```
When GETting a record with associations for a particular object, how many associated object IDs will be returned?
the api logs say I have no request body in my request, which I do, also it says headers are `{}`
For me is always undefined. Working using curl or directly from my backend.
Hi all, does anyone know if it's on the roadmap to create Business Units via the API? Right now we can only GET.
<@U038DUUV3GE> for successful requests, headers and body are not logged. For failures, these will be logged to help with debugging.
<@U07RHD1GJEA> may be give it a try with a different network.
Hi folks, Using the associations API i am able to retrieve only the emails sent to a mentioned contact id ..The reply sent from that contact id is not retrieved. Is there any way to fetch that?
